title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.3 - Election date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.3 - Election date

State Regulations

An eligible employee electing to participate in the excess
vacation exchange program must file an election form by May 1 with the
payroll/personnel office in the employee's agency/facility indicating the
number of days accumulated and the number of days to be exchanged; provided, however, in 1980 such election must be filed on or after June 23, 1980 and on
or before August 22, 1980. Failure to file within this time perid will be
deemed to be a declination of participation in the program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
566.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
